meanings.definition: A type of pasta in the shape of corkscrews.
meanings.sent1: I cooked rotini for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The rotini pasta was delicious with tomato sauce.
meanings.sent3: The rotini pasta danced in the boiling water.
meanings.sent4: Her hair spiraled like rotini pasta.
meanings.sent5: The children giggled as they twirled the rotini on their forks.

meanings.definition: To cook or prepare rotini pasta.
meanings.sent1: She will rotini the pasta for the party.
meanings.sent2: I always rotini the pasta before adding the sauce.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally rotinied the pasta for too long.
meanings.sent4: The chef expertly rotinied the pasta to perfection.
meanings.sent5: Rotiniing the pasta requires attention to timing and stirring.
